article_title: King v. Burwell Would Free More Than 57 Million Americans From The ACA's Individual & Employer Mandates

article_metadata.description: State-level estimates show the number of people who would benefit from a ruling for the Halbig plaintiffs exceed those who would lose subsidies by more than ten to one.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
